title: How to make money trading stocks during earnings season (Ep. 665)
itunes:title: How to make money trading stocks during earnings season
description: The president and CEO of , Edward Karr, joins me today to break down his company’s projects… recent drilling results… and a new hire to its board of directors [16:16].   This new director has an incredible story you won’t believe—and you definitely won’t want to miss. I know many of you enjoy trading stocks around earnings… So here’s how to put the odds in your favor—and make money around Q2 earnings volatility [44:55].
